description: An illustration of a freestanding water dispenser machine; the base is various shades of pink and purple and the bottle appears full of water. There are two spouts on the face of the machine, one red signaling hot water and the other blue signaling cool. There is a thin strip of blue toward the bottom of the illustration indicating a drip tray and on the right side of the machine on the bottom half is a rectangular shape ending in a triangular point, representing a paper cone dispenser. The illustration is made out of a series of triangles of various sizes.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
